Today we are introducing ZK Compression V2

Rent-free Solana tokens and accounts are becoming up to 70% more efficient.

Announcing the [REDACTED] Hackathon Winners 

For the entire month of April, Solana’s research, forensics, and security ecosystems competed for over $175,000 in prizes.

In total, 38 bounties attracted over 900 submissions!

Let's meet the winners:

@Supapumpbot
 — Supa Sleuth Challenge ($500)

Goal: create educational content or tools to report fake activity.

 1st: https://medium.com/@joshuasunday300/the-wild-west-of-meme-tokens-a86fb96d50d4…
 2nd: https://dev.fun/p/b3826f264420873b13ce…
 3rd:

Congrats to all the winners and participants — your contributions are invaluable to the growth and safety of Solana.

Note: Sponsors have until May 31st to disburse bounty payouts.

Questions? Reach out in the public Telegram channel.

This is the last post of this thread.

@tokenmetricsinc
 — Crypto Analysis Report ($3,000)

Goal: produce a crypto report using Token Metrics' APIs and data.

 1st: https://x.com/anarcaze/status/1916049447538315653…
 2nd: https://x.com/Hogwartsofweb3/status/1914388411974344711…
 3rd:

@TheNebulaNode
 — Visualizing Solana Staking ($3,000)

Goal: create a dashboard for Solana staking and performance data.

 1st Place:

@solblaze_org
 — Liquid Staking and Validator Ecosystem Data ($10,000)

Goal: provide insights into liquid staking, particularly bSOL.

Meet the winners:

@Rugcheckxyz
 — Onchain Analysis ($7,000)

Goal: use RugCheck APIs to build projects that protect Solana users.

 1st: https://x.com/Dev_Syrem/status/1913577188957315120?s=19…
 2nd: https://github.com/Ge0frey/chainprobe…
 3rd: https://github.com/Josh0007-sunday/anlytics-defiportfolio…
